metadata.title: CVE-2018-5704 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Open On-Chip Debugger (OpenOCD) 0.10.0 does not block attempts to use HTTPPOST for sending data to 127.0.0.1 port 4444, which allows remote attackersto conduct cross-protocol scripting attacks, and consequently executearbitrary commands, via a crafted web site.

criterions.comment: openocd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
